data.title: John Primer Blues
data.meta_description: John Primer Blues music. 2019 The Soul of a Blues Man, 2017 Ain't Nothing You Can Do, 2015 That Will Never Do, 2013 Knockin' Around These Blues, 2012 Blues on Solid Ground, 2008 All Original, Hard Times, Teardrops for Magic Slim LIVE at Rosa's Lounge
data.text:
Teardrops for Magic Slim LIVE at Rosa's Lounge *2023 GRAMMY AWARD NOMINEE!

ORDER NOW!

Physical CD

In cart Not available Out of stock

2023 GRAMMY AWARD NOMINEE! 2023 BLUES BLAST AWARDS WINNER FOR LIVE ALBUM OF THE YEAR! The John Primer & The Teardrops Tribute to Magic Slim recording is a labor of love. We want to bring Magic Slim back into focus and shine a light on what they accomplished together. John wants the younger generation to listen to Magic Slim & The Teardrops

2023 GRAMMY AWARD NOMINEE! 2023 BLUES BLAST AWARDS WINNER FOR LIVE ALBUM OF THE YEAR! The John Primer & The Teardrops Tribute to Magic Slim recording is a labor of love. We want to bring Magic Slim back into focus and shine a light on what they accomplished together. John wants the younger generation to listen to Magic Slim & The Teardrops and to realize where the music came from. Magic Slim was a giant in the blues world! John Primer was given the opportunity to stand on his shoulders to carry the blues forward. This tribute is a gift to Magic Slim for all that he did for John and the Teardrops! We hope everyone will research Magic Slim & The Teardrops, pay them the respect they deserve and enjoy the music they made together!

Read more…

2023 BLUES MUSIC AWARD NOMINEE FOR ALBUM OF THE YEAR & TRADITIONAL ALBUM OF THE YEAR! GET YOUR CD NOW! These 13 hardcore traditional real deal Chicago Blues songs come straight from the heart and reflect John Primer's 2 time Grammy Nominated status. This Hard Times CD was made to get us through these hard times we are living in today. It will

2023 BLUES MUSIC AWARD NOMINEE FOR ALBUM OF THE YEAR & TRADITIONAL ALBUM OF THE YEAR! GET YOUR CD NOW! These 13 hardcore traditional real deal Chicago Blues songs come straight from the heart and reflect John Primer's 2 time Grammy Nominated status. This Hard Times CD was made to get us through these hard times we are living in today. It will heal you from beginning to end and will take you to a better place.

2019 The Soul of a Blues Man

John Primer & The Real Deal Blues Band, Special Guest Billy Flynn - Blues House Productions

Physical CD

In cart Not available Out of stock

*2019 SOUL-BLUES ALBUM OF THE YEAR, Blues Blast Magazine. This album has 10 hardcore soul-blues cover songs & 2 Primer originals that will groove you from start to finish! Add this Soul-Blues Classic album to your Primer Collection TODAY! BAND: SPECIAL GUEST BILLY FLYNN on guitar STEVE BELL on harmonica, LENNY MEDIA on drums & CHUCK A LUCK

*2019 SOUL-BLUES ALBUM OF THE YEAR, Blues Blast Magazine. This album has 10 hardcore soul-blues cover songs & 2 Primer originals that will groove you from start to finish! Add this Soul-Blues Classic album to your Primer Collection TODAY! BAND: SPECIAL GUEST BILLY FLYNN on guitar STEVE BELL on harmonica, LENNY MEDIA on drums & CHUCK A LUCK on bass.
